summary: Frontend testing of CapCut-style video editor - All 14 requested features verified and working. Tested: project creation, video track addition, demo media buttons, drag-drop to timeline, clip display with titles, audio waveform visualization (252 bars), playback with playhead movement, preview panel showing clip content, timecode updates, timeline zoom (Ctrl+Scroll), horizontal scroll (Shift+Scroll), clip selection with white ring, Split (B key), and Delete functionality.
